mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD(BRDNO, BRDTITLE, BRDCONTENT,BRDIMG, BRDID, BRDHIT, BRDDATE) VALUES (SEQ_BOARD_NO.NEXTVAL, #{brdtitle}, #{brdcontent}, #{brdimg, jdbcType=BLOB}, #{brdid}, #{brdhit}, SYSDATE)
INSERT INTO LIKEBOARD(BRDNO, USERID, LNO,LIKEDATE) VALUES (#{brdno}, #{userid}, 1 ,SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM LIKEBOARD WHERE USERID=#{userid} AND BRDNO=#{brdno}
SELECT LNO FROM LIKEBOARD WHERE USERID=#{userid} AND BRDNO=#{brdno}

SELECT A.BRDNO, A.BRDTITLE, A.BRDID, A.BRDHIT, A.BRDDATE,A.USERNAME, A.ROWN ROWN,NVL(B.BRDLIKE,0) brdlike FROM (select BRDNO, BRDTITLE, BRDID, BRDHIT, BRDDATE,USERNAME, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY BRDDATE ASC) ROWN,ROWNUM NUMBER1 FROM BOARD, MEMBER WHERE BRDTITLE LIKE '%' || #{text} || '%' AND BRDID = MEMBER.USERID ) A left outer join (select BOARD.BRDNO,count(*) brdlike FROM BOARD, MEMBER,LIKEBOARD WHERE BRDTITLE LIKE '%' || #{text} || '%' AND BOARD.BRDID = MEMBER.USERID AND BOARD.BRDNO= LIKEBOARD.BRDNO AND LIKEBOARD.LNO=1 group by BOARD.BRDNO) B ON A.BRDNO=B.BRDNO order by brdno ASC

SELECT * FROM (SELECT BRDNO, BRDID, BRDTITLE, BRDDATE, BRDCONTENT, BRDIMG, BRDHIT, BRDLIKE, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY BRDDATE DESC) ROWN FROM BOARD WHERE BRDTITLE LIKE '%' || #{text} || '%') WHERE ROWN BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE BRDTITLE LIKE '%' || #{text} || '%'
SELECT BRDNO, BRDID, BRDTITLE, BRDDATE, BRDCONTENT, BRDIMG, BRDHIT, BRDLIKE, MEMBER.USERNAME,MEMBER.USERID FROM BOARD,MEMBER WHERE BRDNO = #{no} AND BOARD.BRDID=MEMBER.USERID
SELECT BRDNO FROM BOARD WHERE BRDDATE = (SELECT MAX(BRDDATE) FROM BOARD)
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET BRDHIT = BRDHIT + 1 WHERE BRDNO = #{no}
UPDATE LIKEBOARD SET LNO = 0 , LIKEDATE =SYSDATE WHERE BRDNO = #{brdno} AND USERID = #{userid}
UPDATE LIKEBOARD SET LNO = 1 , LIKEDATE =SYSDATE WHERE BRDNO = #{brdno} AND USERID = #{userid}
UPDATE BOARD SET BRDTITLE=#{brdtitle}, BRDCONTENT=#{brdcontent} WHERE BRDNO = #{brdno}
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(MAX(BRDNO),0) FROM BOARD WHERE BRDNO < #{brdno}
SELECT NVL(MIN(BRDNO),0) FROM BOARD WHERE BRDNO > #{brdno}
SELECT USERID FROM MEMBER WHERE USERNAME=#{username}
